issues.description: The problem statement describes a class named `Meal` (lines 36–40 in problem_statement.md) to represent a meal with a name and ingredients, but the template repository instead provides this entity as class `Order` (src/de/tum/cit/ase/Order.java), while the solution repository uses class `Meal` (src/de/tum/cit/ase/Meal.java). This inconsistent naming for the same conceptual entity will confuse students mapping the problem requirements to the provided code.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the template’s `Order` class and file to `Meal` (i.e., Order.java → Meal.java and `class Order` → `class Meal`) so that the class name consistently matches the problem statement and solution.
